name: Star Anise Chronicles: Oh No Wheres Twig??
name_original: Star Anise Chronicles: Oh No Wheres Twig??
description:
Oh, no!  Star Anise can't figure out where his best friend Branch Commander Twig is!  Can you master his cat powers and help him find Twig?  Can you enlist help from the other lunekos?  Can either of you remember what you were doing for more than thirty seconds?

Controls are arrow keys and Z/X.  I'm sure you'll figure it out.

This is the hotly awaited 1½th game in the highly lauded Star Anise Chronicles series, all about the adventures of my cat's fursona, Star Anise.  Keep an eye out for Star Anise 2, which will be like this, but bigger!

Made with PICO-8 in twelve days, with three tokens and zero bytes to spare!
